General.Name: Jiangsu SINOJIT Wind Energy Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu JIXIN Wind Energy Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of wind power casting products. It offers hubs, bases, rotor shafts, pitch bearings, gear boxes, bearing housings, and other products for the use in wind turbines. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

1.Name: Ms. Tao Yun Zhu
1.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
